attributes.action: Not to allow the advertising of gambling on TV or by other means,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am appalled at the idea of a Labour government encouraging people of all ages to become addicted to gambling by allowing it to be advertised on TV and in other media. What benefits will this bring other than an increase in tax revenue? There are too many bankruptcies in this country already. I long for a sober, orderly society  not an Americanised Great Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
